SELECT brand_name, COALESCE ( tab_rev.chenglnx, 0 ) AS chenglnx, tab_bas.zhucesjzijin, ROUND( ( tab_rev.yingysr_one + tab_rev.yingysr_two + tab_rev.yingysr_three ) / 3, 2 ) AS yingysr, COALESCE ( tab_cre.jdzjzmj, 0 ) AS jdzjzmj, COALESCE ( tab_cre.txyxsc, 0 ) txyxsc, COALESCE ( tab_cre.sczyl, 0 ) sczyl, zlfamnum,zlxyynum,zlxxnum,fmnum, hjgjnum,gjsjnum,gjshijnum, tab_after.dlwz, tab_after.shxysj, tab_after.mfwbq FROM brand_basic_infor tab_bas, brand_bas_rev_perf tab_rev, brand_bas_cre_qua tab_cre, brand_bas_aftersale AS tab_after, (select brand_id,sum(case when zhllx='C0101' then 1 else 0 end) as zlfamnum,sum(case when zhllx='C0102' then 1 else 0 end) as zlxyynum,sum(case when zhllx='C0103' then 1 else 0 end) as zlxxnum,sum(1) as fmnum from brand_bas_patent group by brand_id) as tab_fm, (select brand_id,sum(case when huojjb='C0201' then 1 else 0 end) as hjgjnum,sum(case when huojjb='C0202' then 1 else 0 end) as gjsjnum,sum(case when huojjb='C0203' then 1 else 0 end) as gjshijnum,sum(1) as hjnum from brand_bas_awarded group by brand_id) as tab_hj WHERE c_type = 1 AND tab_bas.id = tab_rev.brand_id AND tab_bas.id = tab_cre.brand_id AND tab_bas.id = tab_after.brand_id AND tab_bas.id = tab_fm.brand_id AND tab_bas.id = tab_hj.brand_id
and date(tab_bas.add_time) >= date(#{beginDate})
and date(tab_bas.add_time) <= date(#{endDate})
